attributes.action: REDUCE STUDENT TUITION FEES IF STUDY IS BASED ONLINE
attributes.additional_details:
How can you expect the future generations of this country. Our students. Accumulate thousands of pounds of debt for a service that will be half received.
Reduce fees
attributes.background:
Reduce fees for students who will be receiving online based tuition this year. 
Paying in full for a service that was expected and will not be catered for is ludicrous. 
Open university offers the equivalent online based learning for a third of a cost
